title: Will SSW Twitch return soon?
body: Seeing as Worlds is coming up I am really hoping it is. Any guesses as to if they will?

replies.body: Is championship thresh coming back? I want that skin along with SSW twitch.
They will return during worlds, along with the championship skins.
They usually do pretty close to Worlds, so it should be fairly soon.
I actually got SSW Twitch in a case :P
